about_the_game:
Please note that the current screenshots are from the pre-alpha of the game.

Small Island is an upcoming first-person exploration game where you have to escape the small mysterious Island you find yourself on.
It quickly becomes clear that this is not a normal island as you find yourself going down inside the passage that has been revealed.
You will need to go deeper to get out.

The game follows a linear path surrounded by more open areas to freely explore. Some areas are more difficult to reach to reward players looking for a more challenging playthrough.
There are optional hidden collectables spread throughout the game that, while not needed to finish or continue the game, will impact the difficulty at the end.

You must escape the island.

KEY FEATURES
- a small round cute island.
- explore a mysterious underground world below the Island.
- real-time buoyancy (and other physically based puzzles/platforms)
- hidden collectables.
